fplR
  • Reference

Summary player data for the 2016/17 FPL season

Summary data for all players in the 2016/17 FPL season.

players1617

Format

A tibble with columns

id

unique player id

code

FPL player code

first_name

player first name

second_name

player second name

web_name

player name displayed on FPL team pages

team_name

team name of player

position

player position

status

player status

news

player news

price

player price, millions

price_change_abs

player price change (millions) over the season

price_change_round

player price change (millions) in the latest round

chance_of_playing_this_round

chance of playing in this round

chance_of_playing_next_round

chance of playing in the next round

value_form

recent player points per million price

value_season

total player points per million price

in_dreamteam

logical if in latest gameweek dreamteam

dreamteam_count

no. times player in dream team of the week

selected_by_percent

percentage of FPL teams player selected by

form

recent points per game

transfers_out

no. of FPL transfers out over season

transfers_in

no. of FPL transfers in over season

transfers_out_round

no. of FPL transfers out this gameweek

transfers_in_round

no. of FPL transfers in this gameweek

total_points

total no. of FPL points

round_points

no. of FPL points this gameweek

points_per_game

average no. of points per game

ep_this

expected points in this gameweek

ep_next

expected points in the next gameweek

minutes

no. of minutes played

goals_scored

no. of goals scored

assists

no. of assists provided

clean_sheets

no. of clean_sheets involved in

goals_conceded

no. of goals conceded

own_goals

no. of own goals scored

penalties_saved

no. of penalties saved

penalties_missed

no. of penalties missed

yellow_cards

no. of yellow cards received

red_cards

no. of red cards received

saves

no. of saves made

bonus

no. of bonus points received

bps

bonus points system total

influence

FPL influence score

creativity

FPL creativity score

threat

FPL threat score

ict_index

FPL influence-creativity-threat index

ea_index

EA index

Source

https://fantasy.premierleague.com/drf/bootstrap-static/, downloaded 2017-06-06

Examples

data(players1617)
